name: This Word is Weapon Album/Shirt Package
description:
For a limited-time only, we are offering a package deal that includes the new This Word is Weapon EP - 'Sophia, The Mother' along with a limited-edition TWIW logo shirt in either men's or ladies' cut.

Music was written/recorded/produced in-house at The Low Country, art/design, packaging, assembly, distribution, and album/apparel printing produced in-house via A Thousand Arms. 

Album includes 4 songs, plus a music video for the 'Pleroma' single (also shot/edited/produced in-house).

Apparel is Bella+Canvas charcoal triblend, printed by hand with custom-mixed 'slate grey' ink.  Standard cut for the men; fitted, scoop-neck for the ladies.

This option is based on a time-limited scenario, whereby this package will only be available until November 3rd (11.3.13) , after which,it will no longer be offered.  Shirts will be printed specifically for those who ordered and the size of the edition will be determined by how many orders are placed.

name: This Word is Weapon - 'Sophia, The Mother' Album
description:
The newest album release from This Word is Weapon contains four original tracks, plus a music video for the first single 'Pleroma'.

01 - Pleroma
02 - Horos
03 - The Lower Wisdom
04 - The First Gnosis
+
(Pleroma Music Video)

These four tracks were written and recorded in their entirety over the span of two days spent by the band at The Low Country recording studio in Bozeman, MT.

Album design, art direction, printing, assembly, packaging, and distribution facilitated by A Thousand Arms.
